i like to write my own songs.

participant_2.background:
I am happy and healthy at my current weight.
I like to spend time with my family in different ways.
my favorite book that i have read lately is middlesex.
i have a large mustache.
I'm always building models of sports cars, so I guess racing is my favorite sport.

content.text: Hello there! How are you today?
Hi there! I'm doing pretty well, thanks for asking. How about yourself?
I'm doing great! Thanks for asking. I just finished reading the book Middlesex, and I really enjoyed it. Have you read it?
I haven't, but I've heard good things about it. I'm more of a nonfiction reader, but I'm always looking for new fiction to try.
I'm the same way. I read a lot of nonfiction, but I also like to read fiction every once in a while. Middlesex is a historical novel, so it's a good mix of both.
That sounds interesting. I'll have to check it out. What kind of nonfiction do you like to read?
I like to read about history, science, and psychology. I also like to read biographies and autobiographies.
Those are all great topics! I like to read about history and psychology too. I'm not much of a science person, but I'll read a good science book if it's interesting.
I'm glad we have something in common! I'm always looking for new people to talk to about books.
Me too! I love talking about books. It's one of my favorite ways to connect with people.
Do you have any books you're looking forward to reading soon?
I'm looking forward to reading The Great Gatsby. I've heard a lot about it, and I'm excited to finally read it for myself.
That's a great book! I read it a few years ago, and I really enjoyed it. It's a classic for a reason.
I'm glad to hear it's good. I'm looking forward to reading it.
